department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: brown and cream striped huipil with multicolored, embroidered zig zags, triangles and diamonds on front; 3 red and gold embroidered, horizontal stripes on each of 4 panels; arm holes are straight and heavily embroidered in maroon, blue and gold at edge and in zig zag band; same colors in embroidered edge and zig zag band around neck opening
title: huipil
